title: Textile, 1785–90
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp: 285 cm (112 in. ). Weft: (selvage to selvage) 96.5cm (38 in.)
description: Bouquets of flowers and medallions containing floral trophies on a massed pink flowers on red background which has been interrupted by stripes containing lillies. Black, two blues, two pinks, mustard and lavender.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1785–90.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-279.
